title: CB buys bonds - bond prices and interest rates

content.question: Assume a countryâ€™s banking system has limited reserves. In the short run, which of the following would occur to the price of previously issued bonds and interest rates if a central bank bought bonds through open-market operations?

choices.label: Bond Prices Interest Rates No change Increase
Bond Prices Interest Rates Increase Increase
Bond Prices Interest Rates Increase Decrease
Bond Prices Interest Rates Decrease Increase
Bond Prices Interest Rates Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Bond Prices Interest Rates Increase Decrease

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
